<p>The 
  <a href="https://www.github.com/ChrisDonovan307/grade_analysis_app" target="_blank">Grade Calculator</a>
  is a Shiny app to make life easier for TAs, specifically in CDAE 1020: World Food, Population, and Development. It takes a csv of grades and returns interactive graphs, summary statistics, and statistical tests to compare grades across cohorts.
